price: Ata qëndruan në shpellën e tyre treqind vjet (diellorë), duke shtuar nëntë (për vitet hënore).
arabic: وَلَبِثُواْ فِي كَهۡفِهِمۡ ثَلَٰثَ مِاْئَةٖ سِنِينَ وَٱزۡدَادُواْ تِسۡعٗا

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: walabithū fī kahfihim thalātha mi-atin sinīna wa-iz'dādū tis'ʿan
